sentences.english: Nasonlanbo was a very famous poetess in the history of Mongolian literature in Qing dynasty.

sentences.english: The legend of Monalun is one of the Mongolian famous historical legends.

sentences.english: This article introduced the Monggol nationality funeral etiquette custom of Shan Dong Yan City.

sentences.english: Mongols live in Mongolia autonomous region. They like wrestling.
sentences.chinese: 蒙古族人居住在内蒙古自治区，喜欢摔跤。

sentences.english: This set of wine containers was given to me by a Mongolian friend.

sentences.english: The Mongolian script is used by Mongolian nationality that live in Inner Mongolia Autonomous Region.

sentences.english: Chapter Three analyzes the names'transformation of Mongolian people in Naiman Banner and discuss the reasons.

sentences.english: The Mongolian nationality was one of the main nationalities in Rehe area.

sentences.english: Wrestling is an important activity in the lives of the Inner Mongolian people.

sentences.english: The first chapter discusses the Mongolian text of myth and evolution of stars.
